summary: Provides core data models and in-memory backend for the mock Marketplace Metering service, including structures for customers, usage records, operation results, and queues to manage them, as well as a backend that aggregates and submits usage data for billing simulation.
business_intent: Enables developers to test and emulate AWS Marketplace Metering interactions by recording usage, handling customer subscriptions, and processing metering results without contacting the real AWS service.
